ticket.title: TextHelper refactored
ticket.original-body:
As with my other helper patches (http://rails.lighthouseapp.com/projects/8994/tickets/665, http://rails.lighthouseapp.com/projects/8994/tickets/666 and http://rails.lighthouseapp.com/projects/8994/tickets/704), here's a patch to make all relevant text helper methods (truncate, highlight, excerpt, word_wrap and auto_link) accept an options hash.
Includes tests plus updated documentation.
